data.message: Rich people shouldn't be involved in politics since a majority of what's going on affect's you know..the middle class. The working class. The Average American household..none of which they are regardless of where they came from.

replies.message: Politics have been in music since the dawn of time, especially hip hop. Why shouldn't he speak about issues? You'd rather the people be kept in the dark?

About issues he has no clue about or that have absolutely nothing to do with him? Celebrities shouldn't speak out on matters that don't affect their lives. I don't want someone speaking for me that isnt being affected by the situation at hand. I'd rather find a credible news source and stick with that. Listening to a celebrity whine about politics is sticking my head farther into the sand and throwing myself farther into the dark. They should all take a lesson from Denzel Washington who refused to talk about anything political during a red carpet interview because he didn't believe it affected him and because he knew since it didn't affect him directly, he wouldn't have the correct information on the situation and didn't want to use his influence to lead people down the wrong road. He's a smart man.
